item.title: About Me
item.description: Coder & Photographer 我的设备 [计算设备] *PC (i7-8700 + 32G + GTX 1066) with Dell 2720Q + Dell 2414H *NUC 11 (16G) with Dell 2520DR (workplace) *QNAP T453D mini with (512G + 256G + 4T) *ThinkPad T460s (i7-6600U + 8G) *RaspBerry 3 (for scheduling) [配件] Filco 87 Black Anne Pro II (workplace) GPW G304 (workplace) Bose SoundLink Resolve BenQ ScreenBar Halo Xiaomi ScreenBar (workplace) [生活] iPhone 11 Pro Max (256G) iPhone X (64G) iPad Pro 2019 12.
